topics.body:
I sometimes wondered.
Why do we even have nuclear arsenals if we know they can do more harm than good?

We have enough nuclear weaponry to poison the world. Twice.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53908aae63687202ed9f0000#post_53908aae63687202ed9f0000
Because in a weird way they actually deter conflict. If not for the threat of mutually assured destruction then it would be a lot more tempting to just invade, butchering thousand and thousands of soldiers and civilians in conventional warfare.

For instance, when was the last time a nuclear power got invaded?
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
